translations.Server to server sharing is not enabled: Server to server sharing is not enabled on this server
translations.Couldn't establish a federated share, ma: Couldn't establish a federated share, maybe the password was wrong.
translations.Federated Share request sent, you will r: Federated Share request sent, you will receive an invitation. Check your notifications.
translations.Couldn't establish a federated share, it: Couldn't establish a federated share, it looks like the server to federate with is too old (Nextcloud <= 9).
translations.It is not allowed to send federated grou: It is not allowed to send federated group shares from this server.
translations.Sharing %1$s failed, could not find %2$s: Sharing %1$s failed, could not find %2$s, maybe the server is currently unreachable or uses a self-signed certificate.
translations.You received {share} as a remote share f: You received {share} as a remote share from {user} (on behalf of {behalf})
You received {share} as a remote share from {user}
translations.Provide federated file sharing across se: Provide federated file sharing across servers
translations.Unable to update federated files sharing: Unable to update federated files sharing config
translations.Share with me through my #Nextcloud Fede: Share with me through my #Nextcloud Federated Cloud ID, see {url}
Share with me through my #Nextcloud Federated Cloud ID
translations.Cloud ID copied to the clipboard: Cloud ID copied to the clipboard
translations.You can share with anyone who uses a Nex: You can share with anyone who uses a Nextcloud server or other Open Cloud Mesh (OCM) compatible servers and services! Just put their Federated Cloud ID in the share dialog. It looks like person@cloud.example.com
translations.Share it so your friends can share files: Share it so your friends can share files with you:
translations.Do you want to add the remote share {nam: Do you want to add the remote share {name} from {owner}@{remote}?
